name: ssun3
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)), wss(c1, cun(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
-| wss(c1, cun(c1, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
-| wss(c1, cun(c1, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2))))

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2))))

comment: Subclass law for union of classes. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
